q: "I asked a successful guy, "What's the best advice you can give me?" He said, " Simon Cowell , know when to leave the fair," he said. I think that's good advice- one year, I actually found myself thinking, "I've run out of insults, I don't know how I'm going to tell people they suck. "Something inside you says, "You know what, it's time to go. "I've enjoyed myself, I mean it"s not the most difficult job in the world, is it? he added. Miranda- her first two gongs were proven by her "People's Choice' win. But I thought all the nominations in that category deserved it. Michael McIntyre 's great, Ant& Dec are great, they are two of the funniest people on TV who are not regular comedians. And I was also really rooting for Horrible Histories because it was great to see something out of the normal parameters of grown-up comedy winning. It is a really funny show, so I'm very pleased. Were you nervous about the Cheryl Cole and Simon Cowell gags? "Nah, not really. One of them I know there's an element of truth in, we're talking about Cheryl Cole "s past.

Amarillo for Amber Alert Awareness Day Howard Stern calls Jay Leno a "crook" in interview Piers Morgan Tonight, the shock jock calls the NBC late-night host "insane" and accuses him of stealing sketch ideas. Jay Leno is a crook and the world knows exactly what he's up to. He steals a tremendous amount of material, The New York Post quoted Howard Stern as saying. "This guy's ripped off like 10 major things from my show." Howard Stern also adds he's baffled that Jay Leno has beaten fellow late-night host David Letterman
